title: kalikEti durlabamu
sahitya:
kalikEti durlabamu shrIta hari bhakti


anupallavi

  kalimi satamanasu talacucu uNTETi kali manajulaku shrI kamalAkSuni bhakti


caraNam 1    parulubhra minceTi bhaktivesamu dAlci dharalOna jIvincE dhanakAnkSulaku bhakti
    caraNam 2    bhava saukhyamulandu paravasulai naTTi avivEkamatulaku ahishayanuni bhakti
    caraNam 3    dhana bhANDamu kAcE tayyamu rItini tanappaikamula yotta taralani vAriki
    caraNam 4    peddala mIdanu suddhulu palikETi buddhi hInulaku bhUmanOharu bhakti
    caraNam 5    orula sampadajIci yOrvaka madilOna karakujununTEya jnAnulaku bhakti
    caraNam 6    pAparahita gOpAla dAsula jEri shrIpati nAmamu cintincakanu bhakti
